description: Valid contract formation - offer, acceptance, consideration
facts: Seller offered to sell car for $10,000
Buyer accepted the offer in writing
Both parties are adults with capacity
asp_facts: contract(c1). parties(c1, seller, buyer). subject_matter(c1, goods). offer(c1, yes). acceptance(c1, yes). consideration(c1, yes). meeting_of_minds(c1, yes). capacity(c1, both_parties). legality(c1, yes). sale_amount(c1, 10000).
question: Is there a valid contract?
